title: God Eater 3 – v2.50 + All DLCs + Multiplayer
body:
God Eater 3 – v2.50 + All DLCs + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: RPG, Action RPG, Third-person, 3D, Japanese
Companies: Marvelous AQL, Bandai Namco Studios, Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 27.5 GB
Repack Size: from 12.8 GB [Selective Download]

The game doesn’t work on CPUs without AVX support (Pentium, Celeron, Core 2 Duo, some others)

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: 4 hosters (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on GOD.EATER.3.v2.50-CODEX ISO release: codex-god.eater.3.v2.50.iso (29,494,640,640 bytes)
  • All released DLCs are included and activated; game version is 2.50
  • Steamworks Fix with multiplayer support via Steam is available in NoDVD folder after installatiom (Thanks to deadmau5 & BzinhoGames!)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip download and installing of Credits & Japanese videos
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 27.5 to 12.8~17.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~30 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 30 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game UI language
  • Voiceovers language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Rise Above a World of Desolation

  • The latest entry in the hugely popular God Eater action series is here!
  • Fight in Style with Brand-new God Arcs!
  • Expand your close-combat armory with the dual-wield God Arc “Biting Edge” and the two-handed moon axe “”Heavy Moon””, or fight from afar with the new “”Ray Gun”” God Arc!
  • New Abilities for Exhilarating Battles!
  • Ground, Air, and Step attacks evolve into powerful techniques with Burst Arts, and the new Dive dash attack allows you full freedom of movement to hunt down wandering Aragami!
  • Fearsome New Threats: Ash Aragami and Devour Attacks!
  • Dangerous new foes, Ash Aragami can utilize Devours Attacks and enter Burst Mode, increasing their strength exponentially! These enemies are not to be trifled with and will require you to take your weapon and your game to the next level!

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS slightly backwards compatible with my previous GE3 repack. You can rehash fg-optional-credits.bin to save 1 GB of traffic.
